sentence: I can feel our campaign’s momentum growing by the day, and I know we are ready to take on and defeat career politician Josh Shapiro this November.” Shapiro, Pennsylvania’s attorney general, is the presumed Democratic gubernatorial nominee.
title: Last of GOP regional straw polls hand victories to Bartos, White for U.S. Senate, governor

sentence: READ MORE: Attorney General Josh Shapiro is the presumptive Democratic nominee for governor.
title: Former President Donald Trump Slams Bill McSwain, Who’d Sought His Endorsement For Pennsylvania Governor

sentence: "The developments didn’t bring much clarity to the crowded race to take on state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, the presumptive Democratic nominee.

title: 'Whiplash-inducing': Trump is 'still sowing chaos' in Pennsylvania GOP politics

sentence: The nine-person field has some state GOP officials worried that a badly divided primary electorate will choose a nominee who can’t beat presumptive Democratic nominee Josh Shapiro, the state attorney general.
author: Associated Press
title: Trump intervenes in Pennsylvania GOP gubernatorial primary
